This dashboard is guiding you through the AWS Workshop for the Elastic Root Cause Analysis Workshop. Start from the top and scroll down to the next section when you completed a task. It is expected that not every prepared visualizations works from the beginning of the workshop.

When you do that make sure that you only take the data after fixing task 1 into account.
